doc.after: The Audubon Aquarium of the Americas is a renowned aquarium in New Orleans Louisiana USA  Recognized as one of the leading aquariums in the United States the Aquarium of the Americas is run by the Audubon Institute which also supervises the Audubon Zoo and Audubon Park in a different part of the city The Aquarium is located along the banks of the Mississippi River by the edge of the historic French Quarter off Canal Street and opened in 1990
